about_the_game:
Who should rule the human's fate–
The human itself or an abstract god?

This is a clash between past and future, tradition and progress, beliefs and ideals.

After a tragic event, you find yourself trapped in a magical time loop. Half a century passes, and your soul withers away, leaving behind an empty shell to aimlessly wander the abyss.

But fate still has plans for you.

A mysterious mage appears, granting you a Golden Soul and saving you from eternal oblivion. Your real soul holds your personality, memories, and emotions. The Golden Soul is a magical imitation that prolongs your existence – but you feel nothing. No blood courses through your veins, no morality guides your actions.

Reclaim your former self. Uncover how you ended up at the edge of the abyss and what ties you to the magical cataclysm slowly devouring the world.

The world is full of dangers and adventures. Progress through the story, battle magical creatures, monsters, fallen heroes, and former friends. Solve puzzles, uncover the world’s forgotten past, and master powerful spells.

Shape history with your choices!

Challenging bosses and intriguing puzzles await!

The game is packed with references to pop culture – see if you can spot them all!
